categories: Category:Battles of the Great Galactic War

nodes.text: During the Great Galactic War between the reconstituted Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic, a twenty-eight-year conflict spanning from 3681 BBY to 3653 BBY, the Empire attacked the planet Loronar with a significant military force. However, the Republic troops under the command of Colonel Aves were able to maintain control of valuable locations on the planet, and as a result the Republic Military was able to eventually drive the Empire off of Loronar permanently.
The battle at Loronar was first mentioned in the Codex entry for General Aves in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing video game released by BioWare in 2011.
